str2: One hundred. Of uncertain affinity; a hundred.
Of Hebrew origin; a bath, or measure for liquids.
Olive oil, oil. Neuter of the same as elaia; olive oil.

str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

str2: To take, receive, accept, welcome. Middle voice of a primary verb; to receive.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From grapho; a writing, i.e. A letter, note, epistle, book, etc. plural learning.

str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

str2: Another form for kathezomai; to seat down, i.e. Set; intransitively, to sit; figuratively, to settle.
Soon, quickly, hastily. Adverb from tachus; briefly, i.e. speedily, or rapidly.

str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
